Card Fraud Prevention Forum
relevant_communication: Please refer to www.smartpaymentassociation.com where all position and white papers are published on regulatory and technical aspects of electronic payments.
goals__remit:
The Smart Payment Association (SPA) addresses the challenges of the evolving payment ecosystem, offering leadership and expert guidance to help its members and their customers realize the opportunities of smart, secure and personalized payment systems & services both now and for the future. 
  
The SPA is a founding Member of the ECSG (European Card Stakeholders Group) and Spokesperson  of the Vendor Sector.
